description: Adaptive Layout definition for the Table component.
label: Table Layout

columns.description: The columns that are defined for this Table component.
columns.label: Columns

compact.description: Indicates whether this Table compact appears compact.
compact.label: Compact

isHeaderVisible.description: Indicates whether this Table displays column headers.
isHeaderVisible.label: Header Visible

rows.description: The rows that are defined for this Table component.
rows.label: Rows

selectionMode.description: The selection mode for this table (none, single, multiple).
selectionMode.label: Selection Mode
